item.title: Learning to Feel Again
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description:
“I think it’s important for people to present themselves as they are, which is messy, because to present yourself as perfect sets up an unfair standard for other people to live by.”

item.title: State of Numbness
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description: Early to rise early to bed, makes a man healthy but socially dead
